entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
